location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 12 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that Prince Hassen Ally Merza [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā] has returned to Sherauz [Shiraz] after his tour of the region. It further notes that Shaikh Abdool Russool Khan [‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān] has averted the danger to his position, and had several districts added to his Government.
